name: Unidentified_Lepi_Nihil
content: A Lepi member of the Nihil marauders served Zeetar's Tempest around 231 BBY. Stationed at the Nihil gas foundry on the planet Xais, the Lepi was hauling a canister of nagnol gas by the captured Hutt Myarga when two undercover Jedi Knights, Keeve Trennis and Terec, were brought in to see the prisoner. In an attempt to avoid being forced to kill Myarga in order to prove she was truly a Nihil, Trennis saw the nagnol canister and used telekinesis to knock it over, setting off an explosion, which causd the Lepi to swear in alarm. The Lepi's fur caught on fire due to the explosion, and they attempted to apologize to their Tempest Runner, Zeetar, but the Talpini, angered that the entire facility could have been destroyed, gunned the Lepi down with the blasters on his powersuit.
